abstract: A report says Google is putting together a group to lay a data cable under the Pacific to reduce costs and increase capacity.
snippet: A report says Google is putting together a group to lay a data cable under the Pacific to reduce costs and increase capacity.
lead_paragraph: Google may be the ultimate do-it-yourself company. From the start, Google’s sense of its own engineering superiority, combined with a tightwad sensibility, led it to build its own servers. It writes its own operating systems.

headline.main: Has Google Plans to Lay a Pacific Cable?
